sen.j: 吉野温泉（よしのおんせん）は、奈良県吉野郡吉野町にある温泉。
sen.e: Yoshino-onsen Hot Spring is located in Yoshino-cho, Yoshino County, Nara Prefecture.
Yoshino-onsen Hot Spring is located in Yoshino-cho, Yoshino County, Nara Prefecture.
Yoshino-onsen Hot Spring is located in Yoshino-cho, Yoshino County, Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 鉄道 近鉄吉野線吉野駅 (奈良県)下車。
sen.e: Train: Get off at Kintetsu Yoshino Line Yoshino Station (Nara Prefecture).
Train: Get off at Kintetsu Yoshino Line Yoshino Station (Nara Prefecture).
Train: Get off at Kintetsu Yoshino Line Yoshino Station (Nara Prefecture).

sen.j: 炭酸鉄泉、炭酸水素塩泉
sen.e: Iron carbonate and hydrogen carbonate spring
Iron carbonate and hydrogen carbonate spring
Iron carbonate and hydrogen carbonate spring

sen.j: 源泉は吉野山中の吉水院の近くに湧出している。
sen.e: The source of the hot spring is located near the Kissuiin in Mt. Yoshino.
The source of the hot spring is located near the Kissuiin in Mt. Yoshino.
The source of the hot spring is located near the Kissuiin in Mt. Yoshino.
Wounds, anemia
External injury, anemia
External injury, anemia

sen.j: ※効能はその効果を万人に保証するものではない。
sen.e: The efficacy does not guarantee good outcomes for everyone.
The efficacy does not guarantee good outcomes for everyone.
The efficacy does not guarantee good outcomes for everyone.

sen.j: 吉野山には旅館、民宿、宿坊などがあるが、そのうちの一部で温泉が利用されている。
sen.e: Some ryokan, minshuku (private home that runs inn providing room and board), and shukubo (visitors' or pilgrims' lodgings in a temple) in Mt. Yoshino use the hot spring water.
Some of ryokan, minshuku (private home that runs inn providing room and board), and shukubo (visitors' or pilgrims' lodgings in a temple) in Mt. Yoshino use the hot spring water today.
Some of ryokan, minshuku (private home that runs inn providing room and board), and shukubo (visitors' or pilgrims' lodgings in a temple) in Mt. Yoshino use the hot spring water today.

sen.j: 温泉は約300年前には既に使われていたとされる。
sen.e: The hot spring is believed to have already been used some 300 years ago.
The hot spring is believed to have already been used some 300 years ago.
The hot spring is believed to have already been used some 300 years ago.

sen.j: 島崎藤村がこの地に逗留したことがあり、ゆかりの宿も現存する。
sen.e: Toson SHIMAZAKI has sojourned at this area, and the lodging associated with him still exists.
Toson SHIMAZAKI has sojourned at this area, and the lodging associated with him still exists.
Toson SHIMAZAKI has sojourned at this area, and the lodging associated with him still exists.
